24#ifndef TCLAP_UNLABELED_MULTI_ARG_H
25#define TCLAP_UNLABELED_MULTI_ARG_H
26
27#include <tclap/MultiArg.h>
28#include <tclap/OptionalUnlabeledTracker.h>
29
30#include <list>
31#include <string>
32#include <vector>
33
34namespace TCLAP {
35
41template <class T>
42class UnlabeledMultiArg : public MultiArg<T> {
43 // If compiler has two stage name lookup (as gcc >= 3.4 does)
44 // this is required to prevent undef. symbols
45 using MultiArg<T>::_ignoreable;
46 using MultiArg<T>::_hasBlanks;
47 using MultiArg<T>::_extractValue;
48 using MultiArg<T>::_typeDesc;
49 using MultiArg<T>::_name;
50 using MultiArg<T>::_description;
51 using MultiArg<T>::_alreadySet;
52 using MultiArg<T>::_setBy;
53 using MultiArg<T>::toString;
54
55public:
73 UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name, const std::string &desc,
74 bool req, const std::string &typeDesc,
75 bool ignoreable = false, Visitor *v = NULL);
94 UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name, const std::string &desc,
95 bool req, const std::string &typeDesc,
96 ArgContainer &parser, bool ignoreable = false,
97 Visitor *v = NULL);
98
114 UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name, const std::string &desc,
115 bool req, const Constraint<T> *constraint,
116 bool ignoreable = false, Visitor *v = NULL);
117
134 UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name, const std::string &desc,
135 bool req, const Constraint<T> *constraint,
136 ArgContainer &parser, bool ignoreable = false,
137 Visitor *v = NULL);
138
147 virtual bool processArg(int *i, std::vector<std::string> &args);
148
152 virtual std::string shortID(const std::string &) const {
153 return Arg::getName() + " ...";
154 }
155
160 virtual std::string longID(const std::string &) const {
161 return Arg::getName() + " (accepted multiple times) <" + _typeDesc +
162 ">";
163 }
164
169 virtual bool operator==(const Arg &a) const;
170
175 virtual void addToList(std::list<Arg *> &argList) const;
176
177 virtual bool hasLabel() const { return false; }
178};
179
180template <class T>
181UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name,
182 const std::string &desc, bool req,
183 const std::string &typeDesc,
184 bool ignoreable, Visitor *v)
185 : MultiArg<T>("", name, desc, req, typeDesc, v) {
186 _ignoreable = ignoreable;
187 OptionalUnlabeledTracker::check(true, toString());
188}
189
190template <class T>
191UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name,
192 const std::string &desc, bool req,
193 const std::string &typeDesc,
194 ArgContainer &parser, bool ignoreable,
195 Visitor *v)
196 : MultiArg<T>("", name, desc, req, typeDesc, v) {
197 _ignoreable = ignoreable;
198 OptionalUnlabeledTracker::check(true, toString());
199 parser.add(this);
200}
201
202template <class T>
203UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name,
204 const std::string &desc, bool req,
205 const Constraint<T> *constraint,
206 bool ignoreable, Visitor *v)
207 : MultiArg<T>("", name, desc, req, constraint, v) {
208 _ignoreable = ignoreable;
209 OptionalUnlabeledTracker::check(true, toString());
210}
211
212template <class T>
213UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::UnlabeledMultiArg(const std::string &name,
214 const std::string &desc, bool req,
215 const Constraint<T> *constraint,
216 ArgContainer &parser, bool ignoreable,
217 Visitor *v)
218 : MultiArg<T>("", name, desc, req, constraint, v) {
219 _ignoreable = ignoreable;
220 OptionalUnlabeledTracker::check(true, toString());
221 parser.add(this);
222}
223
224template <class T>
225bool UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::processArg(int *i, std::vector<std::string> &args) {
226 if (_hasBlanks(args[*i])) return false;
227
228 // never ignore an unlabeled multi arg
229
230 // always take the first value, regardless of the start string
231 _extractValue(args[(*i)]);
232
233 /*
234 // continue taking args until we hit the end or a start string
235 while ( (unsigned int)(*i)+1 < args.size() &&
236 args[(*i)+1].find_first_of( Arg::flagStartString() ) != 0 &&
237 args[(*i)+1].find_first_of( Arg::nameStartString() ) != 0 )
238 _extractValue( args[++(*i)] );
239 */
240
241 _alreadySet = true;
242 _setBy = args[*i];
243 this->_checkWithVisitor();
244 return true;
245}
246
247template <class T>
248bool UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::operator==(const Arg &a) const {
249 if (_name == a.getName() || _description == a.getDescription())
250 return true;
251 else
252 return false;
253}
254
255template <class T>
256void UnlabeledMultiArg<T>::addToList(std::list<Arg *> &argList) const {
257 argList.push_back(const_cast<Arg *>(static_cast<const Arg *const>(this)));
258}
259} // namespace TCLAP
260
261#endif // TCLAP_UNLABELED_MULTI_ARG_H
